articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets extend gains as investors assess business activity figures from around the region - CNBC
articles.description: Purchasing managers index figures are released for Australia, Japan and India for March, as well as inflation figures for Singapore
articles.content: Shares of Chinese bubble tea chain Chabaidao, officially listed as Sichuan Baicha Baidao Industrial, opened 10% lower in early trade on its trading debut in Hong Kong, before plunging more than 30%.… [+605 chars]
